name: compartment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the separate areas inside a vehicle, especially a train: a first-class compartment
a separate part of a piece of furniture, equipment, or a container with a particular purpose: a fridge with a small freezer compartment the sleeping/inner compartment in a tent
medical
  specialized a section in the body that contains muscles and nerves and is surrounded by connective tissue: The knee joint is composed of three compartments and ligaments that stabilize the joint.

any of the enclosed parts into which a space, a vehicle, or an object used for storing things is divided: She folded her coat and put it in the overhead luggage compartment.
